Divider
=======

ContentElement and formwidget for Contao 4 to generate a simple hr (horizontal rule). 
Simply choose element type "divider" and save.

See the demo here: https://demo.clickpress.de/index.php/divider.html

**Installation**

Install with ContaoManager, Composer, manually.
